message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm asking for $22,000 to start. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is quite valuable and $12,000 is significantly below what I'm looking for. Could you do $18,000?
I understand that the product is valuable, but I still think $18,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. Can we discuss further?
